wikipedia_page.main: Stanley Chambers (13 September 1910 – 14 August 1991) was a British cyclist who competed in the 1932 Summer Olympics. Born in Hackney, London, he was the brother of Ernest Chambers. The two brothers rode together to win the silver medal in the tandem sprint event.
